title: Studio Interface
description: Interactive walkthrough of the new Agentic workspace.
content:
# The Studio Interface

Interactive walkthrough of the new Agentic workspace. Hover over the panels to learn their functions.

![Studio Interface Mockup](/images/studio-interface.png)

## The Library

Access your history, saved riffs, and drag-and-drop 'Vibes' into the chat.

title: Tools & Features
description: Overview of slash commands and core capabilities.
content:
# Tools & Features

## Slash Commands

Quickly trigger specific actions in the chat interface.

| Command | Action | Example |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| `/create` | Skip conversation, generate instantly | `/create jazz piano lo-fi` |
| `/remix` | Modify the selected track | `/remix add reverb` |
| `/stems` | Separate audio components | `Exports WAVs` |

## Core Capabilities

_searchMeta.cleanContent: tools features slash commands quickly trigger specific actions in the chat interface command action example:--- :--- :--- create skip conversation generate instantly create jazz piano lo-fi remix modify the selected track remix add reverb stems separate audio components exports wavs core capabilities

title: Introduction
description: Producer.ai represents the evolution of AI music generation.
content:
# Introduction

Producer.ai represents the evolution of AI music generation. Moving beyond the static prompts of Riffusion v1, Producer.ai introduces an **agentic workflow** powered by the new **FUZZ-2.0 audio model**.

## What's New?

title: Songwriting Guide
description: Best practices for generating music with Producer.ai.
content:
# Songwriting Guide

The most common mistake is trying to generate a full 3-minute song in one prompt. The best results come from a **component-based workflow**.

_searchMeta.cleanContent: songwriting guide the most common mistake is trying to generate a full 3-minute song in one prompt the best results come from a component-based workflow
